FuncDef:
The esqm service-stream command configures a packet sampling direction for ESQM on an interface.
The undo esqm service-stream command restores the default configuration.
By default, no packet sampling direction is configured for ESQM on an interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Configures the sampling direction of ESQM to be inbound.
-

Configures the sampling direction of ESQM to be outbound.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After ESQM is enabled globally, you must configure a packet sampling direction before starting ESQM.
To configure a packet sampling direction for ESQM on an interface, run the esqm service-stream command in the interface view.
Precautions
The current version does not support to monitor L2 service flow on the interface.
